doc:
Sherry Bain https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sherry_Bain 0 Sherry Bain is an actress from Angeles, California. She started her career in some exploitation films. She co-starred with Robert Fuller in The Hard Ride in 1971, Wild Riders in 1971, The Ballad of Billie Blue in 1972, an episode of Bearcats!, Pipe Dreams in 1976, Poco... Little Dog Lost in 1977, and Wild and Wooly in 1978. By the early 1970s, her career was moving and she was on the verge of major stardom. Sherry_Bain is an_actress from Angeles , California . She started her_career in some_exploitation_films . She co-starred with Robert_Fuller in The_Hard_Ride in 1971 , Wild_Riders in 1971 , The_Ballad of Billie_Blue in 1972 , an_episode of Bearcats ! , Pipe_Dreams in 1976 , Poco ... Little_Dog Lost in 1977 , and Wild_and_Wooly in 1978 . By the_early_1970s , her_career was_moving and she was on the_verge of major_stardom .
